titleStmt.title: A Looking-glass for good women to dress themselves by: held forth in the life & death of Mrs. Katherine Clarke, who dyed, Anno Christi, 1675. Late wife of Mr. Samuel Clarke, minister.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Miller, at the Gilded Acorn in St. Paul's Church-yard, over against the little north door.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Clarke by Wing.
Includes publisher's catalog ([8] p. at end).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
